Detailed Description

Represents a connection to a remote node.

Multiple connections to a remote node may be used for redundancy.

◆ data_receive_rate()

std::pair< double, double > udp_bridge::Connection::data_receive_rate ( double  time)

Returns the average received data rate at the specified time.

The first element of the returned pair is for unique bytes/second and the second element is for duplicated bytes per second. Duplicated bytes are for packets that had already been received on another connection.

◆ sent_packets_

std::map<uint64_t, WrappedPacket> udp_bridge::Connection::sent_packets_
private

History of recently sent packets.

Each connection keeps a buffer of sent packets in case a resend is needed. The same data packets are replicated for each connection to account for different source_node or connection_id.
